print.io.photosource.defaultgenericimpl

Class DefaultPhotoSourceAdapter<S extends PhotoSource>

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseAdapter
      • print.io.photosource.defaultgenericimpl.DefaultPhotoSourceAdapter<S>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - Type of the PhotoSource used by DefaultPhotoSourceNavigator.

    public class DefaultPhotoSourceAdapter<S extends PhotoSource>
extends BaseAdapter
    Default adapter implementation used by DefaultPhotoSourceNavigator to preview media Items.

    Vlado
